com.microsoft.cognitiveservices.speechrecognition

Class MicrophoneRecognitionClientWithIntent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.bing.speech.Conversation
      • com.microsoft.cognitiveservices.speechrecognition.MicrophoneRecognitionClient
        • com.microsoft.cognitiveservices.speechrecognition.MicrophoneRecognitionClientWithIntent

  • public class MicrophoneRecognitionClientWithIntent
extends MicrophoneRecognitionClient
    AzureIntelligentServices speech recognition from the microphone. The microphone is turned on and data from the microphone is is sent to the Speech Recognition Service. A built in Silence Detector is applied to the microphone data before it is sent to the recognition service. Both recognition results as well as structured intent results in JSON form from the LUIS (see https://LUIS.ai) service.
